title: Best of The Herd: 01/15/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 01/15/2019
description:
Colin thinks the "arctic blast" in Kansas City favors the Patriots because Tom Brady is used to inclement weather.  He compares the Packers staff hires to the show Entourage.  Plus, Super Bowl Champion James Harrison comes in studio to discuss the AFC Championship game and why it’s time for Antonio Brown to leave Pittsburgh.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
